name: Avatar Undercover!
description:
Avatar Undercover is a CYOA retelling of "The Headband" from Avatar: The Last Airbender in the form of a Fire Nation morality tale. Can you bring honor to the Fire Lord and capture the Avatar? (Or not.)

Made this game in Ren'Py as a spec portfolio piece when applying for a Narrative Designer position. Thought it would be a fun concept to make a game that, in-universe, was made by a game dev equivalent to Ember Island Players.  :)
